item.title: ET
item.description: score:-61 Chances: The average brokerage recommendation for Energy Transfer LP is equivalent to a Buy. Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases aid Southwestern’s Q4 earnings. Pembina expects adjusted EBITDA in the C$3.73-C$4.03 billion range for full-year 2024. Investors may keep a tab on stocks like Energy Transfer that have higher dividend yields compared to the industry.

item.title: PCG
item.description: score:40 Chances: PG&E Corporation Foundation offering STEM scholarships to support education and future talent in Science, Technology, Engineering and Math (STEM) disciplines. Risks: Inflation and higher natural gas prices are impacting utility investors and may lead to increased costs for customers. Score:40 chances characters count - risks characters count = 40
